problem.markdown:
>>If a 2 by 18 rectangle has the same area as a square, what is the length of a side of the square?<< = 6
[explanation] Take the square root of the area of the rectangle.
problem.p: If a 2 by 18 rectangle has the same area as a square, what is the length of a side of the square?

formulaequationinput.label: If a 2 by 18 rectangle has the same area as a square, what is the length of a side of the square?

problem.p: Take the square root of the area of the rectangle.
